definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: So there I was happily pan frying the slabs when I lost my grip on one as I was turning it.
sentences.chinese: 我高興地用煎鍋煎魚片，在翻轉魚片時我失手了。

sentences.english: Also be prepared to get wet when taking these kinds of shots.
sentences.chinese: 在拍攝這類照片時也要做好被濺溼的準備。

sentences.english: Improved stability of recording image for some SDHC Memory card.
sentences.chinese: 改進了一些SDHC卡存取照片時的穩定性。

sentences.english: Coat Anti-seize Compound (MP-1) thinly on clamp screw when insert is fixed.
sentences.chinese: 固定刀片時，在緊固螺絲上薄塗燒結防止劑後再使用。

sentences.english: Small children sometimes choke or asphyxiate while trying to swallow big tablets.
sentences.chinese: 幼兒在試圖吞嚥大藥片時有時會噎住或窒息。

sentences.english: Adopted? a little girl he met while filming Blood Diamond in South Africa.
sentences.chinese: 在南非拍攝“血鑽”一片時收養了遇到的一位小女孩。

sentences.english: When you upload images of yourself some people tend to leave in their best pics.
sentences.chinese: 上傳相片時，人們總挑選自己認爲最好的呈現給大家。

sentences.english: It was a steep climb, so we rested for a while halfway up the hill.
sentences.chinese: 因山勢高峻，乃在山腰休息片時。

sentences.english: Q.How did you first see this picture?
sentences.chinese: 你第一次看到這張照片時什麼情形？

sentences.english: How did you first see this picture?
sentences.chinese: 你第一次看到這張照片時什麼情形？

sentences.english: As the cards are collected, they are alphabetized and sorted.
sentences.chinese: 收集卡片時，要把它們按字母排序並進行分類整理。

sentences.english: At least, that's what I found in making this particular photograph.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我在拍這張照片時的發現。

sentences.english: When you are browsing the picture, you can change the RGB color of photo.
sentences.chinese: 當你在瀏覽照片時，你可以更改照片的三原色。

sentences.english: When put all these photos in order, I often listen to light music to take my mind off.
sentences.chinese: 整理這些照片時，我也常聽輕音樂來放鬆自己。

sentences.english: Use toner with ferricyanide when sepia toning photographs.
sentences.chinese: 使用碳粉鐵氰化鉀的照片時，棕褐色色調。

sentences.english: At times some big waves would come in up to my thighs while I was taking this shot.
sentences.chinese: 我在拍攝這張照片時一些大浪偶爾能衝到我的大腿上。

definition: a snap of the fingers/a short moment/in a flash/in the twinkling of an eye
to discuss in whispered tones/whispered conversation
to recollect/to recall (past times)/to look back
to swirl in the air (of thickly falling snowflakes, flower petals etc)/to flutter about
past events/relics from a former age/ruins
